title.rendered: United States Plant-based Meal Kits Market to Hit US$ 3,123.0 million by 2033 amid Growing Demand for Convenient Plant-based Meals

content.rendered:
The United States Plant-Based Meal Kits Market is experiencing significant growth due to a rising emphasis on reducing meat consumption and promoting animal welfare. Increasing awareness about animal cruelty is driving consumers to seek plant-based alternatives, which in turn is expected to boost the market for plant-based meal kits in the US. These kits offer convenient and sustainable options for individuals looking to adopt a more plant-centric diet, aligning with the growing trend of conscious and ethical eating choices. This shift in consumer preferences is poised to drive continued expansion in the plant-based meal kit industry in the United States

NEWARK, Del, Sept. 01, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — According to Future Market Insights (FMI), the United States plant based meal kits market value is set to reach US$ 875.6 million in 2023 and US$ 3,123.0 million by 2033. Over the assessment period, plant-based meal kit demand in the United States is likely to increase at a robust CAGR of 13.6%.

Rise of veganism and growing fame of meal kits due to their convenience are key factors driving the United States plant-based meal kits industry.

Meal kits are considered a healthier and more affordable substitute for takeout. Growing demand for quick, healthy, read-to-cook, and tasty substitutes to conventional fast food takeouts is expected to fuel sales of plant-based meal kits through 2033.

Ready to take your business to new heights? Explore our comprehensive sample report on the United States Plant-Based Meal Kits Market! https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/reports/sample/rep-gb-17902

A large portion of the American population prefers plant-based meal kits due to their several benefits. Meal kits such as prepared meal kits can be cooked with minimal effort as they are already pre-cooked. This is making them an ideal choice for people with busy lifestyles.

Consumers have a wide variety of options to choose from. Adoption of plant based meal kits allows consumers to eliminate the need for visiting a supermarket or hypermarket to shop for vegetables and other ingredients necessary for cooking.

Technological advancements in the manufacturing, packaging, and delivery of these meal kits are expected to help the target market to thrive robustly through 2033.

Consumers today are becoming more and more aware of sustainability, environmental impact, and animal cruelty. As a result, they are turning to sustainable options such as plant based meal kits.

A recent survey conducted by Future Market Insights (FMI) observed a rise in demand for plant-based meal kits especially in the United States as consumers have started to place greater importance on health, wellness, and fitness.

Key Takeaways from the United States Plant Based Meal Kits Report:

  • The United States plant based meal kits market size is estimated to reach US$ 875.6 million in 2023.
  • By 2033, the United States plant based meal kits industry valuation is expected to total US$ 3,123.0 million.
  • Demand for plant based meal kits in the United States is likely to rise at 13.6% CAGR through 2033.
  • By product type, demand is expected to remain high for prepared meal kits in the United States market through 2033.
  • Based on format, shelf stable and frozen meal kits are expected to cumulatively hold a dominant market share.

“The plant-based meal kits industry in the United States is expected to experience significant growth through 2033 owing to increasing demand for plant-based diets and the convenience of meal kit services” – says a lead analyst at Future Market Insights (FMI).

Request Methodology for a Comprehensive Analysis of the United States Plant Based Meal Kits Market. https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/request-report-methodology/rep-gb-17902

United States Plant Based Meal Kits Market Key Companies

  1. Purple Carrot
  2. Green Chef
  3. Veestro
  4. Hungryroot
  5. Splendid Spoon
  6. MamaSezz
  7. Plantable
  8. Trifecta Nutrition
  9. Sakara Life
  10. VegReady
  11. Fresh n’ Lean
  12. 22 Days Nutrition
  13. PlantPrep
  14. Simply Vegan
  15. Vegan Strong

These key players are concentrating on expanding their portfolios by introducing new products and delivery services. They also use strategies such as mergers, partnerships, advertisements, agreements, and acquisitions to gain a competitive edge in the market. For instance,

  • In 2021, Gardein, a leading brand in the plant-based protein market, launched plant-based meal kits that feature their protein-rich products. These kits offer a variety of plant-based proteins, such as chicken, beefless tips, and fishless filets, along with accompanying ingredients to create well-rounded plant-based meals.
  • In 2020, Mobby’s Vegan launched meal kit delivery across the nation with meal kits priced at US$ 79 which included enough food to feed 6 people in a single meal.

Get More Valuable Insights

Future Market Insights (FMI), in its new offering, provides an unbiased analysis of the United States plant based meal kits industry presenting historical demand data (2018 to 2022) and forecast statistics for the period from 2023 to 2033.

The study incorporates compelling insights on the United States plant based meal kits market based on product type (meal kit and prepared meal kit), format (chilled, frozen, and shelf stable), and sales channel (store-based retailing, convenience store, discounters, forecourt retailers, hypermarkets/ supermarkets, food specialist, independent small grocers, other grocery retailers, and online retail) across the United States.

Unlock the secrets of the United States Plant Based Meal Kits Market! Purchase now and delve into the intricacies of each segment. https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/checkout/17902

United States Plant Based Meal Kits Market by Category

By Product Type:

  • Meal Kit
  • Prepared Meal kit

By Format:

  • Chilled
  • Frozen
  • Shelf Stable

By Sales Channel:

  • Store-based retailing
  • Convenience Store
  • Discounters
  • Forecourt Retailers
  • Hypermarkets/ Supermarkets
  • Food Specialist
  • Independent Small Grocers
  • Other Grocery Retailers
  • Online retail

By State:

  • California

  • Florida
  • New York
  • Illinois
  • Ohio
  • North Carolina
  • Michigan
  • Colorado

  • Washington.

About the Food & Beverage Division at Future Market Insights (FMI)

Expert analysis, actionable insights, and strategic recommendations – the Food & Beverage team at Future Market Insights (FMI) helps clients from all over the globe with their unique business intelligence needs. With a repertoire of over 1,000 reports and 1 million+ data points, the team has analyzed the food & beverage industry lucidly in 50+ countries for over a decade. The team provides end-to-end research and consulting services; reach out to explore how we can help.

Author

Nandini Roy Choudhury (Client Partner for Food & Beverages at Future Market Insights, Inc.) has 7+ years of management consulting experience. She advises industry leaders and explores off-the-eye opportunities and challenges. She puts processes and operating models in place to support their business objectives.

She has exceptional analytical skills and often brings thought leadership to the table. Nandini has vast functional expertise in key niches, including but not limited to food ingredients, nutrition & health solutions, animal nutrition, and marine nutrients. She is also well-versed in the pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, retail, and chemical sectors, where she advises market participants to develop methodologies and strategies that deliver results.

Her core expertise lies in corporate growth strategy, sales and marketing effectiveness, acquisitions and post-merger integration and cost reduction. Nandini has an MBA in Finance from MIT School of Business. She also holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering from Nagpur University, India. Nandini has authored several publications, and quoted in journals including Beverage Industry, Bloomberg, and Wine Industry Advisor.

Top Reports Related To Food and Beverage Market Insights

Chilled Meal Kits Market Size: The global chilled meal kits market size is expected to reach US$ 10,062 million in 2023 and further accelerate at a CAGR of 16.3% between 2023 and 2033.

Meal Kit Delivery Services Market Share: The meal kit delivery services market is estimated to reach a valuation of US$ 14.63 Billion in 2022 and is projected to surpass US$ 59.2 Billion by 2032, at a CAGR of 15.0% from 2022 to 2032.

Plant Based Meal Kit Market Analysis: The global plant based meal kit market is predicted to grow from US$ 954.2 million in 2022 to US$ 2,528.5 million by 2032. 

Europe Plant-Based Meal Kit Market Trends: During the projected period, the Europe plant-based meal kit market is expected to record a CAGR of 10.1%. The market size is projected to increase from US$ 1,067.0 million in 2023 to US$ 2,789.0 million by 2033. 

Meal Replacement Shakes Market Value: The global meal replacement shakes market size is projected to reach US$ 18.9 Billion in 2032 and exhibit growth at an astonishing CAGR of 4.3% in the forecast period from 2022 to 2032.

About Future Market Insights (FMI)

Future Market Insights, Inc. (ESOMAR certified, recipient of the Stevie Award, and a member of the Greater New York Chamber of Commerce) offers profound insights into the driving factors that are boosting demand in the market. FMI stands as the leading global provider of market intelligence, advisory services, consulting, and events for the Packaging, Food and Beverage, Consumer Technology, Healthcare, Industrial, and Chemicals markets. With a vast team of over 5000 analysts worldwide, FMI provides global, regional, and local expertise on diverse domains and industry trends across more than 110 countries.
